thread.title: Paris Jackson claims father Michael was murdered
thread.title_full: Paris Jackson claims father Michael was murdered

author: Emma Powell
title: Paris Jackson claims father Michael was murdered
text:
Paris Jackson claims father Michael was murdered 
Paris claimed her father “would drop hints” that people wanted him dead Tuesday 24 January 2017 21:45 BST Click to followES Entertainment Speaking out: Paris Jackson has given her first full interview since her father's death Lilly Lawrence/AFP/Getty 
Paris Jackson has said she believes her father Michael was murdered. 
The 18-year-old claimed the late singer “would drop hints” that people wanted him dead. 
Speaking in her first full interview since Michael’s death in 2009, she told Rolling Stone: “He would drop hints about people being out to get him. And at some point he was like, ‘They're going to kill me one day.’ 
“All arrows point to that. It sounds like a total conspiracy theory and it sounds like b , but all real fans and everybody in the family knows it. 
“It was a setup. It was b .” Family affair: Paris with Janet Jackson, LaToya Jackson, Jermaine Jackson and Prince Michael Jackson II (Blanket) at the Michael Jackson public memorial service (Gabriel Bouys-Pool/Getty) 
Paris claimed that Michael – who was preparing for his mammoth This Is It Tour at the time of his death – was pushed to exhaustion by organisers AEG Live. 
Speaking about her father she said: “I'd tell him, ‘Let's take a nap,’ because he looked tired. 
“My dad was exhausted all the time but couldn't sleep.” 
Paris claimed “a lot of people” wanted her father dead and that she is now seeking justice. 
“I definitely do [want justice], but it's a chess game,” she said. “And I am trying to play the chess game the right way. And that's all I can say about that right now.” 
The King of Pop died, aged 50, from a cardiac arrest which was caused by a combination of prescription drugs. Latest music reviews
